DEMO_021_MSG_010: ́Welcome back, ȁ! First, allow me to formally thank you for saving the entire Nochoro race!
DEMO_021_MSG_170: ̅When you have finished making your preparations, head up to the Monolith. I pray that you succeed, ȁ!
DEMO_021_MSG_020:
̅Now, as we discussed earlier, ȁ... allow me to go over a few details with you.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_030:
̅In a time not that far ago, we Nochoro lived peacefully here among the Silent Meadows.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_040: ̅Suddenly, as if out of thin air... grotesque monsters, tainted by darkness suddenly invaded our home world.
DEMO_021_MSG_050:
̅However, where there exists darkness, there also 
must exist a light.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_060:
̅The Resistance was formed in order to fend off these creatures of darkness, aided by their devices known as Reactors.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_070:
̅Among the Resistance, there was one member who had the ability to tame monsters, working alongside them...
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_080:
̅This courageous Monster Master rose up, and fought
valiantly against these creatures of darkness.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_090:
̅However... he was outnumbered. The Resistance ultimately collapsed along with him, under the weight of these minions of the dark...
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_100: ̅Shortly after, we were forced to live under the rule of the Break Monsters, with no hope, and all dreams faded...
DEMO_021_MSG_110:
̅And yet... here you are, ȁ! It would seem as though the Monster Master's lore lives on through you!
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_120: ̅You are our last ray of hope, that we can restore light back into our world, and get rid of the Break Monsters!
DEMO_021_MSG_130:
̅Listen well, ȁ. You must continue to grow your abilities as a Monster Master.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_140:
̅Unlocking your latent abilities will be the key 
to recovering your memories as well.
DEMO_021_MSG_150:
̅I'd like you to pay a visit to the Monolith up above. It will lead you to a sacred ground, only accessible to Monster Masters.
ā
DEMO_021_MSG_160:
̅We refer to that sacred ground as the Virtual Colosseum. You will be tested there, and may awaken some of your latent powers.
ā
